name: l5r-roller
title: Legend of the 5 Rings Roller
description: Roll Legend of the 5 Rings 5th edition dice in the chat window (s,w for skill, r,b for ring): /l5r 3dr+2ds or /l5r 3dr or /l5r 2ds or /l5r wwbb or /l5r rrsss. Auto rolls exploding successes and let's you re-roll and keep dice.
author: Bernhard Posselt
